trans-unit.target:
Fleece for girls
– Every girl’s favourite!

Fleece is a great multifunctional material for children's wear. Fleece is light, soft and warm as it is and an excellent complement to other children wear when the cold weather comes. POMPdeLUX has a wide range of fleece for girls in size 80 cm to 152 cm. Practical and comfortable spring/autumn jackets, perfect for chilly spring-, summer- and autumn days. Useful fleece suits and fleece sets to wear under shell trousers and jackets or under a snowsuit, ensures to keep her warm in the winter cold or when skiing. Fleece is so nice and soft that all kids love to wear it and it often becomes their favorite and indispensable clothing all year around. In other words: Fleece just works! POMPdeLUX fleece for girls are available in several beautiful colours that can easily be matched criss cross with everything else from POMPdeLUX children's clothing and outerwear for nice and useful outfit where shades match and features play well.

Jackets for girls
– We have styles for all seasons

Outerwear is one of the most important elements in your girl's wardrobe and not to be missed out. The seasons change, the little one grows bigger faster than you can imagine and every season has different requirements and demands on childrens outerwear and POMPdeLUX is ready to meet those. We develop, as time goes by, all types of modern jackets for girls in size from 80 cm to 152 cm and we have always the jacket suitable for the season, your needs and taste. We have a wide range of beautiful coats for girls and every model is made of qualities that meet POMPdeLUX 's strict standards. Although all our girl jackets are sweet, nice and have cute features the jackets are designed to be used often. Durability, functionality and safety is what matters regardless of which model you choose. POMPdeLUX jackets are a product of genuinely Danish design from inside and out and to the tiniest detail.
Shell jackets and shell pants for girls – Check this!

There is no bad weather, only inappropriate clothing... This statement do we at POMPdeLUX agree with completely as we have the clothes to match any weather, so that the kids can play outside every day without getting cold or wet. POMPdeLUX outerwear ensures that you as a parent trust that the outerwear full fills the needs, all safety requirements and not compromise the mobility. Shell jackets and shell pant for girls are a good example of modern and functional outerwear in size 80 cm to 152 cm and will definately give bad weather a fight. Perfect fits and breathable material makes the shell jackets and pantssome of the best outerwear to have in your child’s wardrobe. All POMPdeLUX shell jackets and shell trousers are available in smart and practical colours and has range of good and practical details such as snap buttons, reflector strips and detachable hoods.
Softshell for girls – Find all POMPdeLUX styles here

Water, wind and cold are the biggest challenges when choosing outerwear for children. POMPdeLUX has a great range of good outfits that has been designed to prevent children from being cold and wet and at the same time is comfortable for children to wear - actually so nice that they won’t notice wearing it. Our POMPdeLUX softshell products for girls are windproof and water-repellent. Softshell jackets for girls are available from size 80 cm and up to size 152 cm. Soft Shell suits are available from size 80 cm to size 104 cm. All POMPdeLUX softshell products have the perfect fit for play and activity. The design is quite simple and smart and has practical details that make children's clothes super functional and easy for even the youngest ones to put on. The colours are the characteristic and sweet POMPdeLUX tones that suit all the girls.
Blouses for girls – Find all our adorable blouses here

POMPdeLUX blouses for girls are available from size 80 cm to 152 cm and is perfect for both the smallest and the older girls. The wide range includes normal, classic basic blouses for everyday use and a more exclusive blouses ideal for parties and special occasions. All POMPdeLUX blouses for girls are designed with the sublime style and quality combined with the reasonable price that will always be our trademark. POMPdeLUX blouses, regardless of the model are made for real princesses of the modern kind, that need cute and girly styles that are extremely practical as well. Sweet and gorgeous design that can withstand a rough ride. All the materials are chosen carefully by POMPdeLUX with great emphasis on flexibility, durability and expression. The colours always make the blouses easy to mix and match with a great range of bottoms e.g trousers or skirts to make it easy to create useful outfits.
Cardigans for girls – Nice, stylish cardigans

There is nothing as feminine and practical as a cardigan for girls. A cardigan keeps your girl nice and warm and can easily be put on or taken off depending on the need. Easy to roll up and take with you on the go. A soft and nice cardigan can be used with everything from t -shirts to dresses and is perfect on days when the weather does not really know where it will go. POMPdeLUX cardigans for girls are available in sizes 80 cm to 152 cm and is a cute addition to other clothes both in everyday life and at parties. The colours of all POMPdeLUX cardigans for girls, are in line with the rest of the collection and is therefore easy to match with tops and other styles for sweet and nice set. Think of cardigans as basic styles for girls and with different colours in the closet other styles can be worn for a longer period of time and over seasons if it’s combined with a nice cardigan.
Dresses

POMPdeLUX has dresses in many different colours and cuts. You can find dresses for parties and special occasions and dresses that are perfect for everyday wear and play. At POMPdeLUX we have dresses for all girls – both big and small. All you have to do is pick your favourite. Our dresses start from size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Sweatshirts for girls
– We have the best children’s clothing

Sweatshirts meet most, if not all, the demands of both children and parents typically have on modern clothes. Therefore are POMPdeLUX sweatshirts for girls always super popular and highly appreciated in all seasons. There are only good things to say about sweatshirts, we produce them big and small girls in sizes from 80 centimeters up to size 152 cm. It is these kind of sweaters all girls love to wear because it is mainly the soft, elastic and lovely fabric that we use in all models of jumper , but also the styles that always give space to be active and play free. POMPdeLUX sweatshirts for girls are sweet and full of details and fits beautifully with all bottoms ranging from cool jeans to chic trousers and feminine skirts and crinolines. Sweatshirts are relevant throughout the year and therefore a permanent part of our range of girl's clothes.

Tops for girls
– Find all POMPdeLUX styles here

Tops are not only worn in a particular season, they can be used throughout the year. Light and delicate with bare arms when the sun shines but also excellent under sweaters, blouses, cardigans etc. during the rest of the year. Tops is indispensable and extremely useful. POMPdeLUX has many cute and cool tops for girls in amazing colours, with fancy prints and cool details. They are available from size 80 cm size 152 cm and are great to combine other POMPdeLUX styles for both everyday and special occasions. Tops are great to match with everything from shorts to trousers, leggings and skirts. A cute top can be used to create many different outfits and will be worn again and again. Our tops are soft and smooth against the skin and always flexible and comfortable to wear.
T-Shirts for girls – Find the POMPdeLUX collection here

T-shirts are naturally acosiated with the sun and summer, but nevertheless t-shirts are used throughout the year and is necessary to have a good selection of it in every girl's wardrobe. Every season POMPdeLUX designs and produces new beautiful t-shirts for girls. Our selection of t-shirts contains both the simple, classic basic versions, with short or long sleeves, but also more festive and special t-shirts, which really are filled with sweet details and beautiful prints. All our t-shirts for girls are available from size 80 cm to size 152 cm so all girls can get a soft and cuddly t-shirt from POMPdeLUX. There is not much to say about our basic t-shirts, other than that they are simply fantastic. Besides the unique quality the colours are selected for the collection to make it easy to wear as they are or as an addition to other styles. Our t-shirts with extra details are, of course, produced in the same good quality, just with that little extra.

Pants for girls
– Jeans and leggings for girls as well

Girls are fortunate with the many options when it comes to bottom clothing. The choice is free - they can use pants, shorts and skirts depending on mood and weather conditions. POMPdeLUX celebrates girl’s diversity by having a huge selection of girl pants, so whether your girl likes jeggings, treggings, jeans, classic, soft or baggy pants she can get just what she prefers from us. All styles are made in size 80 cm to 152 cm. Our talented designers have worked extensively with the fit as both design, fit and quality at the right price is very important to us. It is our firm belief that children should be allowed to be kids and it will naturally reflect on design and material selection for our girl pants - always expect durable quality when you buy POMPdeLUX pants for girls.

Jeans for girls
– Lots of styles in stock

No matter what age you are jeans are definitely a favourite, it applies very much also for children. Jeans are casual, practical and classic, like no other trousers and can’t be left out for anyone in the everyday life. POMPdeLUX design jeans for girls in many good styles from size 80 cm to size 152 cm. Although jeans basically are timeless we always try to to hit the current trends when it comes to colours and cuts and has both baggy, slim fit and jeggins for the girls. All POMPdeLUX girl’s jeans are produced in soft cotton denim with a comfortable amount of stretch, so they are resilient and sturd. The fits are also worth high lighting as they are created from many years of experience in designing quality clothing that works. Jeans are ideal to match with all kinds of tops and are beautiful and feminine with e.g. a cute tunic.
Jumpsuits

A jumpsuit is a smart choice for both everyday play and for more festive occasions. POMPdeLUX has chosen the loveliest jumpsuits for both big and small girls. Here you will find exactly your favourite model and colour. Use your jumpsuit over a basic t-shirt or combine it with lovely sweaters and accessories. Our jumpsuits start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Leggings for girls
– See the season’s stunning girl styles here

Leggings is nothing less than a brilliant invention and imagination is the only actual limits on how they can be used. Leggings are both beautiful and practical to wear under a dress, skirt or shorts. They give a little more warmth and a more modern look than tights, but is just as soft and flexible to wear. POMPdeLUX girl leggings are available in a wide variety of wonderful colours and they go from size 80 centimeters to 152 centimeters and fits right into any girl wardrobe. The colours are taken directly from our POMPdeLUX palette, so that they can be combined with other styles in all conceivable ways. All girls love wear leggings and with e.g. an undershirt and a long-sleeved blouse, the fact certainly help to legitimize using a cute summer dress even on chilly days. Leggings are just a great compliment to make many kinds of girl's clothes more useful.

Skirts for girls
– Cute and girly styles!

All skirts are just sweet and feminine and with no doubt many girls undisputed favorite clothes. POMPdeLUX creates, with great pleasure, an ocean of small skirts from size 80 cm to size 152 cm. Choose from many adorable skirts in different lengths, amazing cuts and beautiful colours . Pay attention to all the special details - tulle, prints, bows and other goodies that help to make POMPdeLUX unique and pretty, but never over-decorated and totally impractical. We have the practical and simple skirts for everyday life, but also the skirt for when you want to go all in and be really be festive. Of course we have also thought of how to match and combine tops and bottoms. E.g. with tights, leggings, tops, blouses, etc. to create endless opportunities to make good combinations and personal POMPdeLUX sets that fit exactly your child's taste and at the same time will accommodate your wishes for fine and sensible girl’s clothes.
Shorts for girls – Bring the sunshine!

PEach season has its own charm, but there is probably no season, that makes us more enthusiastic than the time when the sun really take power and the kids can dress lightly. POMPdeLUX shorts for girls available in size 80 cm size 152 cm breaths sweetness, full summer and fun under blue skies. We have many wonderful styles, both plain and with fun prints. They are all designed with focus on that they should be comfortable for children to wear in the summer. This is evident in the details, as elastic and adjustable waist, good length and smart pockets. The fabrics are very soft and light - jersey, cotton and viscose. If the weather is not suitable for bare legs we suggest combining our girl’s shorts with a pair of matching tights. It does not look adorable but is also a great way to get around the capricious summer, and at the same time extend the life of shorts to late summer.

Tights for girls
– Nice and warm!

When we design a POMPdeLUX collection we always trying to think holistic. This means that the entire collection, from basic styles to accessories fit together and can easily be mixed and matched throughout the line. We aim to have a clear correlation between large and small in colour, cut and style so children can be dressed from head to toe in matching POMPdeLUX styles. It is very easy and a great idea if you buy a dress, a pair of shorts or a skirt from POMPdeLUX to choose appropriate tights from the collection. We make soft, elastic and strong tights for girls size 80 cm to size 152 cm. POMPdeLUX tights are available in plain solid colour, with lace pattern or other pattern to make sure we have cute tights for every taste and for every occasions. Note that some tights are sold in packs of two.

Bodysuits for girls
– Find our lovely selection here

Little girls can surely never have too many body stockings. They are just in use constantly and must be replaced continuously as the little one rapidly grows bigger. POMPdeLUX designs body stockings for girls from size 80 cm to size 98 cm and they are nice and sustainable. We have bodystockings with both short and long sleeves and always with a practical snap buttons so that they are easy to open and close. Our body stockings are available in both a plain and a patterned version. The styles are the well-known, classic and simple very girly and sweet. All bodystockings are produced according to Oeko-Tex standard and are GOTS certified. Soft and comfortable against the delicate baby skin and lovely flexible fabric and fit, so you are guaranteed maximum satisfaction and well being of your child. Be aware that some of our fine body stockings are sold as a 2-pack.
Nightwear

With our collection of sleepwear for girls, we're doing everything we can to help your child get a good night and sleep very well. We produce POMPdeLUX nightwear for girls in size 80 cm to 152 cm by Oeko-Tex Standard 100 and GOTS certified. We can not guarantee that your daughter would like to go to bed but we are quite sure that she is going to be easly convienced to put on our soft and comfortable nightwear, whether it's a pajama, nightgown or overalls. We make girl sleepwear in a wide range of lovley colours and prints. Simple and functional designs with sweet details - always of the highest quality, which ensures the well-being and support a good sleep. All girls are therefore well prepared for the many nice trips to dreamland in POMPdeLUX sleepwear - it is both designed to be used often and washed again and again.
Underwear

We have clear attitudes towards children’s clothing at POMPdeLUX and we very serious when we say that our children’s clothes should be of a high quality and truly delicate and nice to wear from the outside to the inside. Therefore, all POMPdeLUX underwear for girls also made exactly according to Oeko - Tex Standard 100 and are also GOTS certified. POMPdeLUX girl’s underwear can be purchased in sizes 80 cm through 152 cm. The assortment contains both vests, hipsters and panties. One style is more adorable than the other, so the sweet and simple style is fully in the girls' taste. We have chosen to distribute our underwear in packs of two, giving you both a plain and a patterned part in matching tones gathered for a really favorable price. POMPdeLUX girl’s underwear is high class, quality and comfort. It’s durable and can be used again and again, just like good underwear should be.

Swimwear for girls
– See our adorable collection here

Do you want take your child to the beach or the pool, then POMPdeLUX has the swimsuit she will be thrilled to wear. POMPdeLUX produces every year the most beautiful swimsuits for girls from size 80 cm up to size 152 cm. Lovley swimsuits and bikinis in nice colours and styles, created for play in the blue waves or a swim in the pool. We have thought about the practicalities - seen in the design, including smarta and child friendly closures and extra layers of fabric inside. We also dabbled with the term and added nice details, like ruffles, prints and small bows that make POMPdeLUX swimwear very feminine and irresistible without being ornate or adult in style. We are fully aware that swimsuits are exposed to sun, salt and chlorine water and therefore the quality of our products are very high.
Belts

To put the finishing touches to your girl's wardrobe, our collection includes many cool accessories. A belt often makes all the difference to what is already a great outfit. At POMPdeLUX we make simple, good quality girls' belts to fit girls of all ages. There's plenty here to inspire you to renew your girl's wardrobe.

Hats for girls
– Lovely hats for summer and sunny days!

Hats are definitely not just for fun though there is hardly a more glorious sight than a cool boy with a smart little hat on his head. Hats are great accessories for boys and just suits everyone super well and immediately add sweet character to any outfit. When all these obvious advantages of hats are mentioned the good protective effect against the sun's radiation, must not be forgotten. It makes sense to protect your boy outside and you do this in a nice way with a hat from POMPdeLUX. We design both cool sun hats in "bucket " style with good shade and classic caps for boys in many sizes. All these hats match our boy’s collection in colours and indeed the same fine quality and unique POMPdeLUX style.

Hair deco for girls
– Match POMPdeLUX clothes perfectly!

Girls are crazy about hair accessories so of course POMPdeLUX has created buckles, rubber bands and hair bands. All our hair accessories match our dresses, blouses and other girl's clothes and therefore add the little special femine finishing touch on all girls' outfits. The har accessories are a simple and tasteful and we have focused on creating the kind of hair accessories that are quite smooth putting in little girls' hair and get out again without hassle. Our hair accessories are great to use for everything from pigtails, bun or braids and can also help keep track of loose long hair. POMPdeLUX hair accessories are perfect as birthday gifts for birthday parties. A package containing all 28 matching parts can easily be split up and come to delight several small and big girls.

Socks for girls
– Match POMPdeLUX clothes perfectly!

POMPdeLUX also think of the little cute details when it comes to socks for girls with shoe size 20 to 38. We sell them in an economical package with two matching pairs that you can buy with a clear conscience, even if they do not cost as much. All POMPdeLUX socks are Oeko-Tex Standard 100 certified - that is good for both the environment and your child. We always have different cute girl socks in a good length in stock, both with lace pattern or completely plain knitted. The colours are carefully matched with the rest of the collection, so the socks match 100 % with other POMPdeLUX girl's clothes. Of course it is soft and comfortable quality socks that are not too tight in the elastic edge. POMPdeLUX socks are also a great gift idea for children's birthdays, because they are anything but boring, but has a feminine design with e.g. patterns or a touch of copper.

Scarfs for girls
– Find everything from POMPdeLUX here!

Girl’s enthusiasm for scarves is not different from adult women and if you are lucky you can probably get permission to borrow your daughters smart POMPdeLUX scarf once in a while. Scarves does not belong to a particular season or outfit, they can be used all year and give a little zing to all kinds of clothes. In winter they can be nice and warm, but scarves are most of all for show and they do excellent. We make scarves in every season, some of them comes a small matching bag, so you get a small set at once. Scarves are sweet gifts that always falls on good ground and quickly come into use. Our scarves are lovely with a neutral blouse, either in a contrasting colour or tone on tone. We have adjusted the colours to match the collection so they are completely consistent and just beautiful.
Accessories

It is the accessories that add the famous finishing touch in a girl's outfit. The accessories can add a personal twist to any outfit. Many girls have a feeling for details and can get this covered with our tasteful and sweet POMPdeLUX accessories. We always have a great selection of accessories, ranging from tights, stockings, leggings, swimwear, swimsuits, bikinis, hair accessories, belts to mittens, hats, scarves and shawls. It is accessories with practical and decorative function which are designed for children. Our highly sought after accessories of course matches the rest of the collection and can be combined with our smart dresses, lovely cardigans, cool pants etc. POMPdeLUX accessories can be used by girls of all ages and sizes so that every little girl can come to live out her great stylist dreams!

Fleece for boys
– Find all our different styles here

Fleece is nothing less than a fantastic and multi-functional material for children's clothing. The fabric is very light, super soft and surprisingly warm as it is and a great supplement to other outerwear when the cold sets in. POMPdeLUX designs a range of different smart fleece items for boys in sizes from 80 cm to 152 cm. Functional and nice jackets, perfect for chilly days in spring, summer and autumn. Practical fleece suits and fleece sets that is a great supplement to shell trousers and jackets or under a snowsuit and that will make it easy to stay warm in winter and on the ski trip. Fleece is so nice and comfortable that all children love to wear it and often prefer fleece rather than anything else. The benefits of fleece can not be stressed enough. POMPdeLUX fleece for boys are available in several nice colours that are easily mixed with other POMPdeLUX outerwear and clothes for great outfits.
Jackets

Outerwear is without doubt one of the most important elements in your boy's wardrobe. Durable, functional outdoor clothing to match the season is simply a must. The designers behind POMPdeLUX make constant great thoughts about how to dress children to protect them from rain, snow and sun and therefore we always have a large selection of excellent jackets in fantastic colours that will cover all requirements and tastes. Our boy jackets are available from size 80 cm to 152 cm and no matter how much focus is put on the design all jackets are produced to allow loads of fun, activity and movement in all children's lives. Quality, safety and functionality are the key words for each jacket. The modern materials are chosen with care and everything in the design and processing has been thoroughly tested so the the wide range of POMPdeLUX boy jackets have a great durability and high standards.
Shell jackets and Shell pants for boys – Shop now!

No, there is actually no bad weather as long as you wear the right clothes. All POMPdeLUX outerwear will actively fight the cold, wind, rain and snow. We design children's clothes that make even the worst days better and we are constantly developing new and exciting products in the range 80 cm to 152 cm which children will love to wear and play well in outdoors even when the weather is funny. Shell jackets and shell trousers for boys have the best fits and optimal protection and are breathable and comfortable to wear. Strong and durable quality and a range of practical details including snap buttons, reflector strips and storm flaps. Shell jackets and shell trousers for boys are available in various nice and practical colours and can’t be left out if you want to dress you active boy great for outdoor activities.
Softshell for boys – POMPdeLUX clothes that last

Rain, wind and frost are the biggest challenges when to fnd the right outerwear for children. POMPdeLUX designs and produces the best outerwear for all seasons and that will always keep children warm and dry and at the same time is flexible and nice to wear. Outerwear for the youngest, is outerwear that they hardly notice wearing and that allows them to be lively and active children. Our POMPdeLUX softshell products for boys are windproof and water-repellent. Softshell jackets for boys are available in size 80 cm to size 152 cm. The beautiful soft shell suits are available in sizes 80 cm to size 104 cm. The fits are designed for play and activity. The design is simple but has all the features and details you can expect from high outerwear. Soft Shell products for boys are available in many nice and practical colors from the classic POMPdeLUX palette.
Blouses for boys – Find all cool blouses here

POMPdeLUX blouses for boys are available from size 80 cm size 152 cm - there is something for both the tiny guys and the big boys. The wide range of blouses for boys are includes both simple and classic basic blouses for everyday use but also more exclusive styles that will do well for parties and special occasions. All POMPdeLUX blouses for boys are designed and produced in the unique style and quality which together with the good price always will be our characteristics. All styles of POMPdeLUX blouses are designed for active, cheeky boys, who need nice clothes that are also functional. Nice and cool design that can meet the demands of an active boy. The great materials used for POMPdeLUX boy blouses are carefully selected so that they are flexible, durable and beautiful to look at.
Cardigans for boys – A classic style

A cardigan for boys is both classic and super convenient. POMPdeLUX is designing cardigans in size 80 cm to size 152 cm making it easy to keep warm. A cardigan is super easy and great to combine with t -shirts, thin blouses and shirts. The cardigan is perfect for a cool morning and can easily be removed if the sun appears. Cardigans are also nice for special occasions a good alternative to a jacket because it is comfortable and flexible to wear, and at the same time really smart. Think of cardigans as a natural part of the boy wardrobe – there are no styles that a cardigan won’t match, both in style and color, as POMPdeLUX always uses the same colour scheme to make it easy to mix and match outfits.
Polo shirts for boys – Nice styles for young gentlemen

Polo shirts are a really timeless boys style that can easily be used all year. Use POMPdeLUX polo shirts as a fresh and sporty alternative to t-shirts and shirts underneath a sweatshirt, cardigan and other tops. Our polo shirts are available in size 80 cm to 152 cm and in so many lovely versions and harmonious colours - there is one for every taste. A classic polo shirt never goes out of fashion and is characterized by short sleeves, a small collar, buttons at the neck, logo on the chest and the solid and elastic fabric. At POMPdeLUX we see no reason to reinvent the wheel. We stick to the good old recipe for how a really nice polo shirt should just be - that is quite simple, neat and in the very best quality, just like young and old gentlemen at all times have preferred their polo shirts.
Shirts for boys – Find nice boy styles here

Shirts completes your boy's wardrobe and there is nothing as great for little boys as a cute or cool shirt that can be used both for every day and for special occasions. We love shirts at POMPdeLUX and designs new all the time to keep a wide range of shirts useful for small and big boys in size 80 cm to 152 cm. POMPdeLUX shirts have a great focus on details that make a shirt nice and unique - chest pockets, collars, buttons and prints. The style is a good mix of very classic and completely modern, well suited for boys and is completely in line with all other POMPdeLUX styles - also the colour scheme. The fit allows room for movement and play and the quality is soft and thoroughly pleasant. Use the shirts alone or with a t-shirt underneath or combine with a sweatshirt, sweater, cardigan or a slip over.

Sports jackets for boys
– Cool college style for everyone

One of our biggest successes, that always deserves a repeat is sports jackets for boys which keep coming back in all POMPdeLUX collections. It's a design we are particularly proud of and which has become a popular POMPdeLUX classic. Sports jackets is a fresh addition to great outerwear during the warm periods. It’s not only is very classic and smart, but also nice and practical for boys size 80 cm to 152 cm. POMPdeLUX sport jackets are completely beyond fashion but has that timeless and very charming college style that suits all cool guys. Sports jackets are available in several different colours and they are all filled with cool details that make these jackets irresistibly cute to look at and super cool to wear. A sports jacket is easy to put on and take off. The style is fairly simple, with zipper or snap closure, cuffs and pockets - just sporty and cool.

Pullovers for boys
– Great styles all year round

Since the weather is not always what we might wish for is a soft and snug pullover nice to have. It will be useful all year to protect against the cold. A pullover is close to indispensable in the winter months, but nevertheless also convenient on cool summer days. Unfortunately, children do not always share adult’s enthusiasm for pullovers and knitwear as children tend to find them itchy and clumsy to wear. You sense immediately that POMPdeLUX pullovers for boys are soft and light. They have been thoroughly tested and thought through in every way so that you have the certainty that a boy pullover from POMPdeLUX is made entirely for children's taste and yet comply with your requirements. POMPdeLUX pullovers for boys fits excellently with eg. a nice shirt and a pair of pants or jeans.

Sweatshirts for boys
– Soft, classic clothes for children

Sweatshirts meet the vast majority, if not all, of the needs parents and their children have regarding modern and smart clothes. There is a myriad of good reasons why POMPdeLUX sweatshirts for boys are so loved and sought after in all collections. There can only be positive things said about the sweatshirts. We design them for big and small boys in size 80 cm to size 152 cm. All boys love to wear the sweatshirts and the cause is the flexible and fantastic fabric which we use to produce all our sweatshirts, but the styles are also of great importance - a POMPdeLUX sweatshirt fit just perfect and provides good opportunities to romp and roam. POMPdeLUX sweatshirts for boys are exceptionally smart and have just the right amount of cool and decorative details. Combine sweatshirts with shorts, pants and jeans for the perfect outfit.
T-shirts for boys – Get all POMPdeLUX styles here

T-shirts are the symbol for summer and sun, but are being used all year around. In any boy's wardrobe should be a good stack of t-shirts because t-shirts are in constant use, whether the sun is shining or not. In every POMPdeLUX collections you will find a wide range of t-shirts for boys, both the simple basic styles with long and short sleeves, but also t-shirts and henleys with additional details and beautiful prints. POMPdeLUX boys t-shirts are available in an array of beautiful colours and in size 80 cm to 152 cm. They have all the soft, elastic and good qualities kids love to wear and can withstand being favorite t-shirts that will be worn again and again. They are great as they are but always super to combine with a cardigan, fleece or other warm clothes if needed.
Slipovers

It's great to give a boy a lovely warm gilet to wear on cold winter days and cool summer evenings. POMPdeLUX offers boys' gilets in beautifully soft fabrics. We offer several different styles. A gilet is a great way to spice up an outfit and works well everyday – and on special occasions too. Our boys' gilets are available from size 80 cm to size 104 cm, and there is plenty here to inspire you to renew your boy's wardrobe.

Pants for boys
– Lots of jeans in stock as well
